cards.name: Drink 3
cards.description: Take a drink three times.

cards.name: Whore
cards.description: You are the whore. You drink up to three times when someone else drinks.

cards.name: Choose 3
cards.description: Choose someone to drink three times.

cards.name: Down your drink
cards.description: Down your drink. You have 60 seconds.

cards.name: Drink
cards.description: Take a drink

cards.name: Choose
cards.description: Choose someone to take a drink

cards.name: Card of drinking
cards.description: Shotgun a can of drink or take a shot

cards.name: Question master
cards.description: You are the question master. If someone answers a question you ask, they drink.

cards.name: Rule
cards.description: Make up a rule. Everyone must follow this rule. Previous rules are no longer active.

cards.name: Summer
cards.description: Everyone born in the summer takes a drink.

cards.name: Distribute 5
cards.description: Distribute five swigs among the players.

cards.name: Drink n times
cards.description: Drink as many times as there are players in this game.

cards.name: Category
cards.description: State a category and players must state things, that belong in this category. The loser must finish their drink.

cards.name: Rhyme
cards.description: Choose a word. Players must say words that rhyme with the chosen word. The loser must finish their drink.

cards.name: Waterfall
cards.description: Everyone starts drinking until the player on their right stops. The player who drew this card can stop at any time.
The player who drew this card drinks once, the player on their right twice, and so on for all players.

cards.name: Story
cards.description: Start a story with one word. Players must repeat the story and add one more word. The loser finishes their drink.

cards.name: Democracy
cards.description: Vote on a player. The player with the most votes must shotgun a beer or take a shot.

cards.name: Coinflip
cards.description: Flip a coin. If heads everyone drinks three times. If tails you drink six times.

cards.name: Half full
cards.description: If your drink is less than half-full, finish it. Otherwise choose someone with less than half-full drink to finish it.

cards.name: Chug master
cards.description: You can at any point make a player finish their drink. Can only be used once.

cards.name: Go back
cards.description: The previous player drinks three times.

cards.name: Thumb master
cards.description: You can at any point put your thumb on the table, and all players must follow. The last player to do this drinks.

cards.name: The unlucky number
cards.description: Players start counting numbers from 1. All numbers containing or divisible by 7 must be skipped. The loser drinks three times.

cards.name: Winter
cards.description: Everyone born in the winter takes a drink.

cards.name: Long hair
cards.description: The player with the longest hair drinks.

cards.name: Pointing fingers
cards.description: Everyone points a finger at a player at the same time. The player with most fingers pointed at drinks 3 times.

cards.name: Even age
cards.description: If your age is an even number, take a drink.

cards.name: Science question
cards.description: Ask the player on your right a science question. If they are right, you drink. If they are wrong, they drink.

cards.name: Drum a beat
cards.description: Drum a beat on the table. The player on your right must drum your beat again. If he fails, he drinks 3. If he succeeds, you drink 3.

cards.name: Truth or dare
cards.description: The player on your right asks you to play truth or dare. If you refuse, finish your drink.

cards.name: 2 truths and a lie
cards.description: State 2 truths and a lie about yourself. The player on the right tries to guess the lie. If successful, you drink 3 times. If not, he drinks 3 times.

cards.name: Good memory
cards.description: If you can't remember what your last card did, take a drink. Otherwise, choose someone to drink.

cards.name: Black socks
cards.description: All players wearing black socks take a drink.

cards.name: General knowledge question
cards.description: Ask the player on your right a general knowledge question. If they are right, you drink. If they are wrong, they drink.

cards.name: Drinking sick
cards.description: Anyone who has ever been sick while drinking takes a drink.

cards.name: Apple
cards.description: Anyone that owns an Apple product takes a drink.

cards.name: Android
cards.description: Anyone that owns an Android phone takes a drink.

cards.name: Siblings
cards.description: Take a drink for every sibling you have.

cards.name: Pale
cards.description: The most pale player takes a drink.
Start counting numbers from 1. You can say up to 3 numbers. After, pass the turn to your right and so on. The player that says 21 drinks.

cards.name: Arm wrestle
cards.description: Have an arm wrestle with the player on your right. The loser drinks 3 times.

cards.name: Cash
cards.description: The player with the most cash on them must drink.

cards.name: Forgiveness
cards.description: Choose a player. Anyone except you and that player must drink.

cards.name: Hum a song
cards.description: Hum a song. The first player to guess the song can choose someone to drink 3.

cards.name: Most likely
cards.description: Starting with you go round saying Most Likely to do x and then players point their finger at someone. The player with the most votes drinks.

cards.name: Majority rule
cards.description: All players choose either black or white and state their choice at the same time. The minority drinks.

cards.name: Beer
cards.description: If you are drinking beer, drink 3. Otherwise, choose someone to drink 3.

cards.name: Long drink
cards.description: If you are drinking a long drink, drink 3. Otherwise, choose someone to drink 3.

cards.name: Big shoes
cards.description: The player with the biggest shoe size drinks.

cards.name: One more
cards.description: The player who last drank drinks.

cards.name: I choose you
cards.description: Pick a player. Start drinking at the same time. You can stop only after the player you chose stops.

cards.name: Thumb war
cards.description: Have a thumb war with the player on your right. The loser drinks 3.

cards.name: Rock paper scissors
cards.description: Play rock paper scissors with the player on your right. The loser drinks 3.

cards.name: Free drink
cards.description: Pick a players drink and take a drink from it.

cards.name: Video games
cards.description: The player who owns the most video games takes a drink.

cards.name: Drink for name
cards.description: Drink for every letter in your name.

cards.name: Balance
cards.description: Everyone must stand on one leg. The first player to fall must drink 3.

cards.name: Going to bar
cards.description: Starting with you go round saying 'I'm going to the bar...' and adding one drink name. The player who messes up drinks 3.

cards.name: Empty everything
cards.description: Everyone downs their drinks.

cards.name: Choose to down
cards.description: Choose someone to down their drink.

cards.name: Weakest drink
cards.description: The player with the weakest drink takes a drink.

cards.name: Instrument players
cards.description: Anyone who can play an instrumet drinks.

cards.name: Dog breeds
cards.description: Starting with you, go round saying dog breeds. The player who takes over 10 seconds drinks 3.

cards.name: Phone users
cards.description: Anyone on their phone right now drinks 5.

cards.name: Quench the thirst
cards.description: The player who hasn't drank for the longest time drinks.

cards.name: Mr. Worldwide
cards.description: The player who has been to the most countries drinks.

cards.name: Riddle
cards.description: Tell the player on your right a riddle. If you can't think of one or they guess correctly, you drink. Otherwise, they drink.

cards.name: Currencies
cards.description: Starting with you, go round saying currencies. The player who takes over 10 seconds drinks 3.

cards.name: Higher or lower
cards.description: Play a game of higher or lower with a positive number below 100. Players have 5 tries and will guess in turn. The loser(s) drink 3.

cards.name: Secret drink
cards.description: Close your eyes and try to guess a secret drink the player on your right gives you. If correct, the other player drinks 3. If not, you drink 3.
